p.d: Béatrice is furious not to be able to take legal proceedings against her brother's attacker without a formal complaint from Danny and reproaches her father for not having done anything at the time. Christophe, overcome by remorse, asks Benoît to persuade Danny to help his daughter. Directed by: Louis-Philippe Héneault (season 3, Canada, 2016) Author: Francine Tougas Cast: Sophie Lorain (Béatrice), Gabriel Arcand (Mr P.), Pierre-Luc Brillant (Olivier-Luc), Linda Sorgini (Gin), Gabriel Sabourin (Benoît), Robert Lalonde (Christophe), Marie-France Lambert (Isabelle), Monique Spaziani (Bernadette), Marie Turgeon (Lucie), Virginie Ranger-Beauregard (Véronique), Mikhail Ahooja (Anju), Rosalie Moreau (Océanne), Mathieu Lorain-Dignard (Arnaud), Rachel Graton (Caroline), James Hyndman (François), Stéphan Allard (Jean-Gilbert) Genre: drama
